trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> rappresenta una definizione di classe dello schema contenuta nella partizione dello schema.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> che specifica il contesto per questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the LDAP display name for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" /> che rappresenta il nome visualizzato LDAP per questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> metodo deve essere chiamato per eseguire il commit di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> oggetto creato nell'archivio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" />, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="context" /> non fa riferimento a una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" /> valida, il parametro <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> è una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> o <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> contenente le classi ausiliarie dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> contenente gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> che rappresentano le classi ausiliarie dell'oggetto della classe di schema corrente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il CN (Common Name) dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the CN of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.String" /> che rappresenta il CN dell'oggetto della classe corrente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> descriptor of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il descrittore <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> predefinito dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> che rappresenta il descrittore di sicurezza predefinito per l'oggetto della classe di schema corrente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una descrizione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a description of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.String" /> contenente una descrizione dell'oggetto della classe corrente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse usate dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse usate dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the managed resources should be released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le risorse gestite devono essere rilasciate. <see langword="false" /> se devono essere rilasciate solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> ed eventualmente le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> che specifica il contesto per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.String" /> che specifica il nome visualizzato LDAP della classe di schema per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> contenuto nella partizione dello schema di Servizi di dominio Active Directory che corrisponde a un contesto di directory e a un nome specificati.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object for the schema class that was found.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> per la classe di schema trovata.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if the class was not found.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="null" /> se la classe non viene trovata.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto non è stato trovato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" />, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="context" /> non fa riferimento a una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" /> valida, il parametro <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> è una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> o <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> contenente tutte le proprietà, comprese le proprietà predecessore, dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> collection of the properties of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />, including ancestor properties.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> delle proprietà della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />, comprese le proprietà predecessore.

trans-unit.source: If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se il metodo viene chiamato su un'istanza dell'oggetto non associato, vuota <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> viene restituita una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory entry for the schema class.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> che rappresenta la voce di directory per la classe dello schema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is not a valid instance.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> non è un'istanza valida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> è inattivo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica se l'oggetto classe dello schema corrente è inattivo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto è inattivo; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> must contain.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> contenente le proprietà che la classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> deve contenere.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects that represent the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object must contain.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> contenente gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> che rappresentano le proprietà che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> deve contenere.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore ldapDisplayName dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere l'argomento [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" /> contenente il valore ldapDisplayName dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere l'argomento [nome visualizzato LDAP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in MSDN all'indirizzo [ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the OID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'OID per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the OID of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.String" /> che rappresenta l'OID dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> contenente le proprietà che la classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> può contenere.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> contenente gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> può contenere.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> contenente gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> che possono contenere questa classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that can contain this class.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il commit di tutte le modifiche all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> corrente nell'archivio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: The context is an AD LDS configuration set and the AD LDS instance could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto è un set di configurazione AD LDS e l'istanza di AD LDS non è stata trovata.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore schemaIDGUID per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere l'argomento "schemaIDGUID" o "Schema-ID-GUID" in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> object that contains the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> contenente il valore schemaIDGUID dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> viene utilizzato in molte operazioni di configurazione di servizi di dominio Active Directory, ad esempio la gestione dei diritti estesi.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schema class from which the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is derived.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la classe di schema da cui deriva l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object that contains the schema class from which the current schema class is derived.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> contenente la classe di schema da cui deriva la classe di schema corrente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if no schema class was specified during the creation of the current class.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> se non è stata specificata alcuna classe di schema durante la creazione della classe corrente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome visualizzato LDAP dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the LDAP display name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.String" /> che rappresenta il nome visualizzato LDAP dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> type for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> value that contains the type of the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> contenente il tipo di oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> value (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: Il tipo specificato non è un valore <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> valido (si applica solo all'insieme).
